long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Support mute of a certain tab in Google Chrome browser.

Provide default shortcut keys, Change as you needed
  - Windows:   "Ctrl+T"
  - Mac:    "Command+T"

Provide Dark Mode Theme

==============================

Chrome 71 removed the flag that enables per-tab audio muting. This extension allows you to mute individual tabs by a new context menu option or interacting with the extension icon.

Restores the 'Mute Tab' functionality of versions prior to Chrome 71 and Enhance on this.

==============================

The previous version of the extension used belonged to the v2 level and the developer did not update it, so this v3 extension is now available.
